title: Want to fix virtual gatherings? Add the right tech
description:
One year into wide-spread WFH, do you ever end your video call and ask yourself, 'Why are we still using Zoom?'
In 2020, our work style changed. A lot. But our tools have not.
Xiaoyin Qu, founder and CEO of a platform called Run The World, explains how to bring the right tech to virtual gatherings. She’ll offer some much-needed clarity as to technology’s role in our maybe-remote, maybe-IRL future, and predict what large-scale conferences will look like post-pandemic.
